projects.name: CP-UIDeck
projects.summary: Recreated the styling of a theme from uideck.com based on screenshots received.
projects.description: Only utilizing CSS/SASS & HTML to clone the look of a site from screenshots received.

projects.name: Webpage Scroll GIF
projects.summary: Automatically creates a GIF of scrolling down a webpage for a given url.
projects.description: Useful for when you want to showcase a looping video of a (dynamic) webpage, especially when you've used parallax (i.e. on-scroll) effects.
